gremlins.gameObjects

Class Gremlin

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.gameObjects.Gremlin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, GameObject, Movement

    public class Gremlin
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject, Drawable, Movement
    Represents a gremlin game object that can be drawn and moved.

        x - Initial x-coordinate of the gremlin
        y - Initial y-coordinate of the gremlin
        imgDir - Image loader for managing images
